title: Psalm 129
content:
(For 8 stichera) Out of the depths I cry to You, O Lord;* O Lord, hear my voice!
Let Your ears be attentive* to the voice of my prayer.
(For 6 stichera) If You mark iniquities, O Lord, who can stand?* But with You forgiveness is that You may be revered.
I have waited for You as You have commanded;* my soul patiently relies on Your promise, for it has trusted in the Lord.
(For 4 stichera) From the morning watch until night* let Israel trust in the Lord.
For with the Lord there is mercy and with Him there is plentiful redemption;* and He shall redeem Israel from all its iniquities.
